sub_fields.label: Overlay
sub_fields.name: overlay
sub_fields.instructions: Adds an overlay over the background image

fields.label: Container Margins
fields.name: container_margins
fields.instructions: The space between the container and the edge of the screen/browser.

fields.label: Container Mobile Margins
fields.name: container_mobile_margins
fields.instructions: The space between the container and the edge of the screen/browser for mobile.

fields.label: Mobile Reverse Row
fields.name: mobile_reverse_row
fields.instructions: Swap column positions for mobile when columns collapse into one. If reverse row is also enabled, then they cancel out and would follow default behavior.

fields.label: Column Scaling
fields.name: column_scaling
fields.instructions: 12 column grid size options for the two columns

fields.label: Separate Padding
fields.name: separate_padding
fields.instructions: Individually specify the top and bottom padding. Used when they have different values.

fields.label: Padding
fields.name: both_padding
fields.instructions: Values in pixels (px). For both top and bottom padding.

fields.label: Top Padding
fields.name: top_padding
fields.instructions: Values in pixels (px). For top padding.

fields.label: Bottom Padding
fields.name: bottom_padding
fields.instructions: Values in pixels (px). For bottom padding.

fields.label: Block Visibility
fields.name: block_visibility
fields.instructions:
Can hide blocks from displaying without having to delete the entire block.
Mobile triggers at 768px.
